## Properties

| Property               | Attribute      | Description                              | Type                                    | Default     |
| ---------------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `example` _(required)_ | --             | The preview to show                      | `DesignbaseComponentExample<undefined>` | `undefined` |
| `showExample`          | `show-example` | Whether the example should be displayed. | `boolean`                               | `false`     |

| -------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
